div.note: مسلمه بن أبو القاسم المجريطيAbu al-Qasim Maslama ibn Ahmad al-Majriti c. 950-1007, scholar in the Caliphate of Córdoba, from Madrid
div.ab: Moslema Ben Ahmad Abul cassem of Madrid
Madrid or Magrit a little place near Alcala ao xt 1087: ao Hegira 3981087AD (Casiri has 1007AD), AH 398. Almagrid.
Leo Afric?Leo Africanus, born al-Hasan ibn Muhammad al-Wazzan al-Fasi (c. 1494 – c. 1554), diplomat and author of Descrittione dell’Africa (1550). [Description of Africa]
بربر Berber [Amazigh]Barbar: peregrini Pliny. Sabarbares.Barbar: strangers[.] Pliny. Sabarbares [an African tribe mentioned by Pliny]
القرطبي Alcorduba CordovaAl-Qurtubi (1214-1273), renowned scholar from Córdoba.
Ebn Albanna Granatensis in Scientiam Logisticam.
Abu Isaac Abrahami vulgo Alphardi nobilis Granats. Poema de Haereditate.
Carmen de Temporum cognitione Ben Schariph Alzabdi Heg. ao. 601 of Ronda
div.note: Ebn Albanna of Granada, On the Science of Logistics. Abu Isaac Abrahami, commonly called Alphardi, nobleman of Granada, Poem on Inheritance. Poem on examination of the Times, Ben Schariph Alzabdi, AH 601 of Ronda
div.ab: Vizir Abu Mohamad Ben Omad writes dedicatory oration to Abu Nassar Ismail Kg. Granada Heg. ao. 761AH 761 to The work in artem Numericam of Ben Albanna by Abdelazizi Ali Ben Daud AlhauariOn the Numerical Art of Ben Albanna (Casiri: i.e. Alhauari's commentary on Ben Albanna).
Apollonius. Eutocii in Archimedis Librum de Sphaera & Cylindro –Apollonius. Eutocius on Archimedes’s Book on the Sphere and the Cylinder
Dioclis de speculis ustoriisDiocles on burning mirrors.. Astronomy of CadiCasiri has 'Cadhi' Zadeh commented by Senan Pascha.
Ammon GeometraAmmon Geometry. Theodosius Ariston, Aristarchus. Aimonius. Philemon. Plato. Erhotus or Aratus
Eutocius or Eutharchius. Mathem. Alexandrinus. writtenEutocius of Alexandria, Mathematics. written اطزيقوسi.e. his name in Arabic.

Lexicons numberless. Ebn Seira XXIV books words senses origins. Proverbs. Fables Locman. Philosophy mathematics. medicine. Nat’ Natural History Harun Almansor & Almaimon faventesfavoured Casiri explains that Harun, Almansor and Almaimon enjoyed the favour of leaders..
Only in Arabic Apollonii Pergaei Conicorum libri quinqueFive books by Apollonius of Perga on Cones..
Galeni 2d Commentaries 2 3 4 & 6 on Hippocrates Epidemiorum librum secundum.Galen's 2nd Commentaries 2, 3, 4 and 6 on Hippocrates's second book on Epidemics. & other books only in Escurial.
Astronomy Abi Schaker Granatensisof Granada
Mathem’ Ebn Albanna Granatensis

note.bibl: From Casiri, Bibliotheca, vol. 1, pp. x-xiii.

div.ab: Khogenda a great city 7 days from Samarcand on river Sihun. gardens & fruits.
Moh’ Mohamad Ben Schariph Alhasbati Logic Granada.

Hortus or Ortus disputationum Fakhreddin RazaeusThe Origin of Debates, Fakhreddin Razaeus [Casiri has 'vulgo Rasis': commonly called Rasis] who wrote against a heretic who gave God eyes & body. Ahmad Ben Hayet a Motazelite said Xt Christ had really come in body &was the Verbum aeternum & incarnatum.

Jahia & Moysem Maimonidem genere JudaeumMoses Maimonides of the Jewish race whose advice caused Ferdinand IV K.S. King of Spain to drink plentifully of cold iced water in a fever. Works in Escurial preserved by Moors.
Abu Mohamad Abdalla of Corduba Equestris Theatri spectacula.Equestrian Theatre.
Isa Ben Ali Hassan of Granada. Hawking & hunting.
Geography & Travels of all sorts. Chronology.
Abu Abdallah alkatib Granatensisof Granada hist of Kgs of Spain or Caliphs of Spain & Africa.
Lives of famous men & horses even & Kts Knights' . arms habits & customs by Abu Abdallah Mohamad Ben Zaiad of Corduba.
Dict hist Scientiam Moh Abu Abdah Granatensis
div.note: Historical Dictionary of Knowledge [Casiri has 'Historica Scientiarum Dictionaria'] by Mohamad Abu Abdallah [Casiri has 'Abdalla'] of Granada
From Casiri, Bibliotheca, vol. 1, pp. xii-xvi.
div.ab: De Vini laudibusIn Praise of Wine Abu Isaac Abrahim with 355 Epigrams in praise of Wine – Drinking jokes &c.
Liber Vitae perennis ao 432 Heg died at Albusia inter Bokhora & Samarkand.Book of Everlasting Life, AH 432, died at Albusia [Casiri has 'Aldabusia'] between Bukhara and Samarkand.
Also a very free Amantis confabulationemLover’s conversation very witty &c
Anatomy of Women &c
Liber elegantiarum Delectus.
Dictionary by Moh’ Ben Abdelmalek of Xeres.
Codex Arabic Hebrew latin by Johannes Leo Granaten’ once Alhassam Ben Mohamad Alvazan Fessanus. Heg 930. 15243 Xti Leo Africanus, he was of the noble family of Zaidi–tarum Granatae.
Elmansor of Rasis ob 320 Heg. Medicina Mansoriana.
div.note: Dictionary by Mohamed Ben Abdelmalek of Jerez de la Frontera. Codex Arabic Hebrew Latin by Joannes Leo of Granada, once al-Hassan ibn Muhammad al-Wazzan al-Fasi, AH 930, 1523/4AD, Leo Africanus, he was of the noble family of Zaidi of Granada. Elmansor of Rasis died AH 320, Mansorian Medicine.

Analysis – Argumentation. Conditiones certae fidei.

From Sevilla many. Abulsat Omiah Ben Abdelaziz Botany.

Ali Alkateb logic Granada 1395 or 798.
Aristotelis Organum Syriac.
div.note: Torch of Lights – Porphyry the Syrian of Tyre. Ammonius From Sevilla many. Abulsat Omiah Ben Abdelaziz Botany. Lesson of Truth, Mohamad Ebn Almoaidi [Casiri has 'Alomaidi'] of Cordoba wrote it at Granada in AH 798, 1395AD. Ali Alkateb logic Granada 1395 or 798.
